title: CISA Alert - Ransomware Campaign Targeting Healthcare Sector
summary: CISA warns of active ransomware campaign targeting healthcare organizations. Enhanced monitoring recommended.

title: FBI Warning: Business Email Compromise Attacks Increasing
summary: FBI reports significant increase in BEC attacks targeting businesses. Verify all wire transfer requests.

title: National Cybersecurity Awareness Month Resources
summary: Educational resources and best practices for individuals and businesses to improve cybersecurity posture.

title: Critical Infrastructure Attack Reported
summary: Coordinated attack on critical infrastructure detected. Federal agencies coordinating response.
